hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: Hermes is a 7-node public testnet for Basecoin 0.6.0. It allows sending tokens to Mercury (our other testnet) through a relay.  [Offline]

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: Mercury is a 7-node public testnet based Basecoin 0.6.0.  It allowed sending tokens to Hermes (our other testnet) through a relay.  [Offline]

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: Venus is a 7-node public testnet based on Ethermint 0.3.0. It allows you to do everything you can do with the standard Ethereum network, but at 10-times the speed and a much lower cost per transaction. [Offline]

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: sdk1 is a public testnet for the first version of Cosmos SDK.

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: Tak is a continually updated development testnet for Cosmos SDK.

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: gaia-1 is the first time Cosmos SDK and Tendermint Core are bundled together to form an experimental version of the Cosmos Hub. It includes a dynamic validator set.

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: gaia-2 includes basic delegation, UI integration for bonding and unbonding, and a PEX reactor for dynamic peer discovery.

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: Multiple instances of gaia-3000 are set up by the Cosmos community, following in the wake of new Tendermint and Cosmos SDK releases. The most recent version was gaia-3008.

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: gaia-4000 has improved stability, bug fixes, and runs on Cosmos SDK 0.15.0.

hub.title: Testnet
hub.notes: gaia-5000 includes support for block rewards for validators and commission fees.

hub.title: Cosmos Hub
hub.notes: Final version of Cosmos Hub before we launch. Features are frozen.

sdk.title: Basecoin
sdk.notes: The last version of Basecoin before it is renamed to Cosmos SDK.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Basecoin is renamed to Cosmos SDK for a more descriptive name. It will serve as the primary framework for building the Cosmos Hub.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos-SDK 0.9.0, or the 'New SDK', initializes genesis state and marks a significant milestone, in that everything (gaia-3, Voyager 0.5.0, and partner projects) gets unblocked.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos-SDK 0.10.0 "Thales" has improvements to BaseApp and a mock staking CLI.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos-SDK 0.11.0 adds more tests, more examples, and spec for the REST API.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos SDK 0.12.0 'Aristarchus' is part of a two-week sprint to refactor the SDK and to implement cross-chain visibility and transfer.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos SDK 0.13.0 'Sima Tan' merges in the full staking module, improvements for `basecoind`, and a new `democoin` example app.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos SDK 0.14.0 'Shi Shen' includes improvements to staking, usability, and refactoring to reduce duplicated code.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos SDK 0.15.0 includes the upgrade from go-wire to go-amino.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos SDK 0.16.0 includes staking functionality, new validator bonding/unbonding functions, and lots of refactoring.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Cosmos SDK 0.17.0 includes querying for candidates and delegator-bonds, current state exporting, transaction tags, and a spec for IBC.

sdk.title: Cosmos SDK
sdk.notes: Final version of Cosmos SDK before we launch. Features are frozen.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: The first public release of Tendermint includes address generation from a seed phrase and sending of coins.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Starting from this release (0.7.0 "Tommy") we commit to following a strict semantic versioning discipline and release protocol. In recognition of this monumental occasion, we bumped the version number a few extra times.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.8.0 "Chuckie" includes support for validator set changes, handshakes between Tendermint and app, BFT-liveness fix, and more test coverage.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.9.0 "Phil and Lil" includes a new client API and RPC endpoint for viewing header and commits of particular blocks.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.10.0 "Angelica" includes major updates to configuration, logging, and json serialization. Also includes the Grand Repo-Merge of 2017.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.11.0 "Susie" includes querying for validators at previous heights.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.12.0 "Dil" includes RPC calls for genesis, abci_query, and more.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.13.0 "Constantine" adds new RPC endpoints, a new trust metric for tracking peers, and TxIndexConfig.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.14.0 "Keanu" adds a light-client RPC proxy.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.15.0 "Leo" adds an RPC query for transactions at a give block height, a new evidence reactor, state features, and new docs.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.16.0 "Lovelace" includes major P2P updates, a new specification and improvements to the config.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.17.0 "Hopper" includes lots of P2P improvements, preparation for switching to go-amino encoding, and doc and spec updates.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.18.0 "Hamilton" includes breaking changes to address formatting, new RPC endpoints and RPC fixes.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.19.0 upgrades go-wire to go-amino. This is a sweeping change that breaks everything that is serialized to disk or over the network.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Tendermint 0.20.0 upgrades ABCI to 0.11.0. The new version of ABCI supports slashing and auto-unbonding for Cosmos Validators.

tmc.title: Tendermint
tmc.notes: Final version of Tendermint Core before we launch. Features are frozen.

gui.title: Netmon UI
gui.notes: Before Voyager, there was the web-based Tendermint Blockchain Platform UI. TMUI was designed as a multi-blockchain management interface. Components of the platform are used today in Voyager, primarily the network monitor portion.

gui.title: Basecoin UI
gui.notes: The Basecoin UI was conceived as a stripped down cryptocurrency wallet with send, recieve, address list, and theming functionality. The idea is that anyone can fork this wallet for their own cryptocurrency based on Basecoin.

gui.title: Delegation UI
gui.notes: The Delegation UI is a razor-sharp focused user interface for Cosmos ATOM holders to use to bond to Cosmos validators. Functionality included viewing validators, bonding to validators, and voting on proposals.

gui.title: Cosmos UI
gui.notes: Cosmos UI was built together from three parts: the Netmon UI, the Wallet UI, and the Delegation UI. Version 0.1.0 was the first time all three components were integrated in one Electron-based application.

gui.title: Cosmos UI
gui.notes: This is the first public release of Cosmos UI. In this version, you are able to create a Cosmos account. You also have the ability to send and receive tokens on the gaia-1 testnet.

gui.title: Cosmos UI
gui.notes: In this version, we have updated to the gaia-2-dev testnet, which has delegation functionality, so you can now bond tokens to validator candidates. It is now a full proof-of-stake system!

gui.title: Cosmos UI
gui.notes: In this release, we upgraded the UI to use the gaia-2 testnet, and added a block explorer, among many other enhancements.

gui.title: Voyager
gui.notes: Voyager 0.5.0 runs on a mocked network that offers users an interactive preview of 1.0 features.

gui.title: Voyager
gui.notes: Voyager 0.6.0 works with the light client daemon (LCD) from the new Cosmos SDK. Voyager now supports the gaia-5000 and gaia-5001 testnets.

gui.title: Voyager
gui.notes: Voyager 0.7.0 supports block rewards and commission rates for validators.

gui.title: Voyager
gui.notes: Final version of Voyager, the UI for Cosmos, before launch. Features are frozen.
